title: Design Your Destiny: Shape Your Future in 12 Easy Steps
description: These 12 powerful inner life exercises will help you master the strong and subtle forces that actually determine your life choices and your destiny. You''ll discover why so many of your daily choices up to now have been made by default, and how embracing the truth about yourself will banish your self-defeating behaviors forever. Guy Finley reveals and removes many would-be roadblocks to your inner transformation, telling you how to dismiss fear, cancel self-wrecking resentment, quit secret self-sabotage and blaming others for the way you feel.
author: Guy Finley
